name: Smiley Jump
description:
Hi !

I'm releasing a new game for “My First Game Jam”, the jam is 2 weeks long, and I go in vacation during the jam, so my challenge was creating a game in 5 hours. I started 04/07/2022 at 8 : 00 pm to end at 11 : 30 pm, so challenge complete ! I spent the first hour at searching for an idea, and it's the only idea not too hard to do with unity i've had. There are a lot of problems, so you can report them in the comment I will try to fix it, thanks if you test the game, and sorry for my bad English.
